content: बद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [बंध्-कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Bound, tied, fastened. {@--2@} Chained, fettered. {@--3@} Captured, caught. {@--4@} Confined, imprisoned. {@--5@} Put or girt on. {@--6@} Restrained, suppressed, withheld. {@--7@} Formed, built. {@--8@} Cherished, entertained. {@--9@} Combined, united. {@--10@} Firmly rooted, firm. {@--11@} Shut, stopped, closed. {@--12@} Inlaid, studded. {@--13@} Composed (as verses). {@--14@} Formed, contracted; <ls>Ku. 1. 20.</ls> {@--15@} Manifested, displayed. {@--16@} Entangled, involved. {@--17@} Congealed, clotted (as blood). {@--18@} Effected, caused, formed, produced; बद्धं जालक <ls>Ś. 1. 30</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">2. 6</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 17</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 7.</ls>
